name: Sniper Terrorist Strike
description:
Sniper Terrorist Strike combines cinematic presentation with dynamic gameplay to create an ultimate Sniping experience for real. Give your best shot with the Sniper Terrorist Strike Game. Sniper Terrorist Strike is best sniping game available in market. Enhance your perfect aiming and timed shooting skills with Sniper Terrorist Strike. Sniper Terrorist Strike Shot will provide you an opportunity to prove your ultimate sniping skills. In Sniper Terrorist Strike Shot, you need to shoot down the high risk targets. These high risk targets are very dangerous for the humanity. As a professional sniper, show your real response to complete the mission and make your earth free from these criminals & assassins. Use your ultimate sniping skills against these criminals assassins and bring peace to your world.
Sniper Terrorist Strike is consists of multiple sniping missions. In Sniper Terrorist Strike you need to clear your assigned mission to get access to next one. Use your clear aiming and ultimate sniping skills to complete the mission in time.
Game Features:
1.Sniper Terrorist Strike is loaded with 25 gaming levels...
2.Best Sniping environment & graphics
3.Best Sniping controls
4.Gun Selection
5.Interesting sniping missions and game story
6.Upgrade your Weapon in Game Play.

For any suggestion/feedback feel free to contact us at gamingport559@gmail.com
